welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gainsborough, the charming and historic town in the heart of the United Kingdom. With its beautiful landscapes and rich heritage, we invite you to immerse yourself in all that Gainsborough has to offer and create unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humaita Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humaita Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humberside International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
